mapper.insert: insert into basketTB(basket_id, username, ticket_id, cnt, validity) values (basketTB_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, 1)
mapper.select: select t.ticket_id, t.arrive, t.price, b.cnt as seat_buy from ticket_All t, basketTB b where t.ticket_id = b.ticket_id and b.username = #{param1} and b.validity = 1
